column2: Have you been told you have/had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation?
Have you been told you have/had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation? If yes, ER/hospitalized or saw M.D.?
Are you taking any of the cardiovascular medications below?  Anticoagulants (Coumadin, Warfarin, etc.)
Are you taking any of the cardiovascular medications below?  Antiarrhythmics (Quinidine, Procainamide, Norpace,Disopyramide,etc)
